name: puckishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is puckish (= typical of someone who takes pleasure in causing trouble, but may be funny and attractive) : The writing is a mix of the colloquial and the puckishly clever. She remembers, puckishly, an incident that occurred when she was about three years old.
More examplesFewer examplesHe puckishly announced that no matter where we were going, he would not be coming with us. At 86, he looks puckishly healthy, munching a slice of fruit cake baked by his wife. He seems less comfortable cackling puckishly than you might imagine.
